overview: Le Pharaon à Lyon is an episode of the Carnets filmés which takes place in France: in the Champ du Feu in the Vosges mountains, in Strasbourg, in Montreuil-sous-Bois, in the Bois de Vincennes in Paris, in Burzet (where I film, for the 22nd time, the Good Friday ceremony), in the snows of the Vivarais and Bugey regions and in Lyon where, with Philippe Djivas, Joseph Morder, Stéphane Collin, Nicolas Cornut, Frank Richard and Kathy Sebbah, I am scouting for the project of a series, entitled Le Pharaon.
title: Le Pharaon à Lyon
